text.en: How amazing!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: Primordial protector, dharmakāya Samantabhadra;
text.en-trans: dömé gönpo chöku kuntuzang

text.en: Five sambhogakāya families, the ten Lords and Ladies;
text.en-trans: longchö dzok ku rik nga yabyum chu

text.en: Nirmāṇakāya buddhas, Śākyamuni and all thousand and two teachers;
text.en-trans: tulku sangye shakya tubpa dang

text.en: Cose heart-son heirs and all such noble beings;
text.en-trans: tönpa tong tsa nyewé sé chen sok

text.en: Assembly of victorious ones of the ten directions and three times—
text.en-trans: chok chu dü sum jönpa gyalwé tsok

text.en: To all the sugatas, I pray!
text.en-trans: dewar shekpa nam la solwa deb

text.en: Guide me and all beings, all six classes, out of samsara!
text.en-trans: dak dang dro druk khorwé né né drong

text.en: Eight teachers of the noble land, eyes of the world;
text.en-trans: jikten mik gyur pakyul lobpön gyé

text.en: Chief teacher of the great secret, Guru Rinpoche;
text.en-trans: sang chen tön tso guru rinpoche

text.en: Lady Tsogyal, compiler of the secret mantra teachings and
text.en-trans: sang ngak ka yi du pön tsogyalma

text.en: The guru’s heart-mudrā consort; the monarch and his three sons;
text.en-trans: tuk jön mu tra ngadak yabsé zhi

text.en: The twenty-five subjects, foremost scholars and siddhas—
text.en-trans: jebang nyernga khé dang drubpé tso

text.en: To all who have shown such kindness to Tibet, I pray!
text.en-trans: bö la drinchen dzé la solwa deb

text.en: Please look with compassion upon the Tibetan people of this degenerate age.
text.en-trans: nyikmé bö bang nam la tukjé zik

text.en: Lamps of the world—the hundred and eight great tertöns;
text.en-trans: jikten drönmé terchen gya tsé zhab

text.en: The thousand and two minor tertöns, unbiased guides of beings;
text.en-trans: rimé dro dren tertren tong tsa nyi

text.en: And the millions of tertöns who find treasures anew, benefiting all they encounter;
text.en-trans: dreltsé dönden yangter jewé tsok

text.en: The Dharma lords and lineage holders; and, in particular, all those in this present age
text.en-trans: chödak gyü dzin khyepar danté dü

text.en: Who are perfectly learned and disciplined, unerring and supreme,
text.en-trans: khé tsün puljung ten drö mik nam su

text.en: And whose entrancing dance beautifies the doctrine and beings—
text.en-trans: dzepar gar gyur trulmé gangzak chok

text.en: To all of you who are beyond all doubt, I pray!
text.en-trans: tetsom nemé nam la solwa deb

text.en: And especially, the paṇḍita who upholds the doctrine in this dark age,
text.en-trans: khyepar nyikmé tendzin pandita

text.en: Chemchok Dütsal of immeasurable awakened mind,
text.en-trans: chemchok dü tsal changsem tsemé ching

text.en: Who took birth on the anthers of a lotus and displayed the twelve deeds,
text.en-trans: dru jé dong trung dzepa chunyi kyi

text.en: The guide and guardian of beings,  Palden Gyurmé
text.en-trans: dro dren gönpo palden gyurmé ché

text.en: Ever-gracious guru, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: kadrinchen gyi lamar solwa deb

text.en: Through the power of this prayer to you, all-encompassing embodiments,
text.en-trans: chikchok gyurpar solwa tabpé tü

text.en: Bless me that outer, inner, and secret obstacles are quelled!
text.en-trans: chi nang barché zhiwar jingyi lob

text.en: Bless me that the two siddhis are attained!
text.en-trans: ngödrub nam nyi tobpar jingyi lob

text.en: Bless me that I may directly see my own mind as the buddha,
text.en-trans: rangsem sangye ngönsum tongwa dang

text.en: And that throughout all lifetimes, wherever birth and death lead me,
text.en-trans: namzhik kyechi khalo gar gyur kyang

text.en: I am accepted and embraced by Orgyen Pema, Lotus of Uḍḍiyāna!
text.en-trans: tserab orgyen pemé jedzin shok
